For the king prawn and shiitake mushroom: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: For the king prawn and shiitake mushroom skewers, thread the shiitake mushrooms and king prawns alternately onto two skewers and drizzle with olive oil.

Heat a griddle pan until hot and griddle the skewers for 3-4 minutes on each side. Add the honey and lemon juice, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and griddle for a further 1-2 minutes on each side, or until the mushrooms are tender and the prawns are completely cooked through.
For the spicy spinach salad, place the spinach into a bowl with the olive oil, chilli flakes and the juice of half the lemon and stir well.
To serve, place the spicy spinach salad onto a serving plate, top with the skewers and garnish with the remaining lemon half, cut into wedges.
title: King prawn and shiitake mushroom skewers with spicy spinach salad
